name: Ultimo Reino
description:
Features:

-World by zones and PVE.

-Elaboration: make armors, weapons, shields, dresses and papyruses, each element created is unique.

-Domestication: You can tame everything in the world. They will fight on your side.

-Create your class: Warrior, Wizard or Tank each class will have one more point, without limitations.

-Metamorphosis: Become any creature in the world!

-Mounts: Many different mounts to buy!

-Trade: You can trade with any player!


Frequent updates ...
